title: I3C Core Configuration
description: Specifies the configuration for the I3C core

CmdFifoDepth.description:
Size of the HCI Command Queue in entries.
Each command descriptor is a size of 2 DWORDs.

RespFifoDepth.description:
Size of the HCI Response Queue in entries.
Each response descriptor is a size of a DWORDs.

RxFifoDepth.description: Size of the HCI RX Queue (buffer) in DWORDs.

TxFifoDepth.description: Size of the HCI TX Queue (buffer) in DWORDs.

IbiFifoDepth.description:
Size of the HCI IBI Status Queue.
If `IbiFifoExtSize` is specified size is defined as `IbiFifoDepth` * 8 DWORDs.
Otherwise `IbiFifoDepth`.

IbiFifoExtSize.description:
Extend the size of IBI Queue.
If set will assign the `IbiFifoDepth` * 8 size to the IBI Queue.

FrontendBusInterface.description: Bus protocol to be utilized for the I3C Core <-> System integration.

FrontendBusAddrWidth.description: I3C Core <-> System bus address width in bits.

FrontendBusDataWidth.description:
I3C Core <-> System bus data width.
If specified data width is greater than 32 bits, only the least significant 32-bits will be considered.

ShowcaseOptionalNode.description:
This node is not required and will be ignored if not specified in the configuration
If specified will be validated as normal.
